sentences.en: A flock of birds flew towards us slowly from far away.
sentences.cn: 一群鸟儿从远处朝我们缓缓飞来。

sentences.en: All the windows face toward the river.
sentences.cn: 所有的窗户都朝向河。

sentences.en: Brian’s attitude towards his work has always been very positive.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩的工作态度向来非常积极主动。

sentences.en: Do not wait for good things to happen to you. You need to walk towards happiness.
sentences.cn: 不要等待好事降临，你要向幸福进发。

sentences.en: Fusilier Jones ran towards the Ops Room to find his lieutenant.
sentences.cn: 燧发枪团士兵琼斯奔向作战指挥室寻找他的中尉长官。

sentences.en: He noticed two policemen coming towards him.
sentences.cn: 他注意到两名警察正朝他走来。

sentences.en: He stares detachedly into the middle distance, towards nothing in particular.
sentences.cn: 他漠然而漫无目标地注视着不远处。

sentences.en: He tramped hurriedly round the lake towards the garden.
sentences.cn: 他匆匆地迈着沉重的步伐绕过湖边向花园走去。

sentences.en: He walked towards the summerhouse, at first furtively, then with more confidence.
sentences.cn: 他朝凉亭走去，开始还偷偷摸摸地，后来就壮大了胆子。

sentences.en: He was standing with his back towards me.
sentences.cn: 他背对我站着。

sentences.en: I pushed on towards Flagstaff, a hundred miles to the west.
sentences.cn: 我继续西行，向100英里外的弗拉格斯塔夫进发。

sentences.en: I saw a man making his way towards me.
sentences.cn: 我看到一名男子向我走来。

sentences.en: It is shocking that humans can behave with such bestiality towards others.
sentences.cn: 令人震惊的是，人竟然能对同类下此毒手。

sentences.en: My feelings towards Susan have changed over the years.
sentences.cn: 这些年来我对苏珊的感情发生了变化。

sentences.en: Not everyone in the world will be kind and caring towards you.
sentences.cn: 并非世上每个人都会对你友善关心。

sentences.en: Sir Geoffrey had no personal animosity towards the Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 杰弗里爵士对首相并无私人恩怨。

sentences.en: The king's indulgence towards his sons angered the business community.
sentences.cn: 国王对儿子们的纵容令商界恼火。

sentences.en: The main road continues towards Viterbo before turning right to Bolsena.
sentences.cn: 大路一直延伸到维泰博，之后右转通向博尔塞纳。

sentences.en: The money collected will be put towards repairing the church roof.
sentences.cn: 募集到的钱款将用于修缮教堂屋顶。

sentences.en: Traditionally young Asians in Britain have gravitated towards medicine, law and engineering.
sentences.cn: 英国的亚裔年轻人通常被吸引到医学、法律及工程专业。

trans.tran_cn: 向，朝，对着，倾向于，关于，用于，将近，接近
trans.tran_en: money put, saved, or given towards something is used to pay for it
